name: qieos
description: QiEOS monorepo - unified client portal, admin control, APIs, AI, billing, and per-client public websites

scripts.dev: concurrently -n WORKER,WEB -c magenta,cyan "npm run dev --workspace=workers/api" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/web"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/types && npm run build --workspace=packages/utils
scripts.postbuild: npm run build:kb && echo 'KB pages synced to Neurite'
scripts.dev:stack: concurrently -n WORKER,WEB,NEURITE -c magenta,cyan,green "npm run dev --workspace=workers/api" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/web" "npm run start --workspace=apps/Nuerite/Neurite"
scripts.deploy:web: npm run build --workspace=apps/web && wrangler pages deploy apps/web/dist --project-name=qieos-web
scripts.deploy:sites: echo 'Use GitHub Actions or run wrangler pages deploy for each site'
